description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 3, 4} mod 5.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 200], MemberQ[{0, 3, 4}, Mod[#, 5]] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 12 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [ n : n in [0..150] | n mod 5 in [0, 3, 4] ]; - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 31 2011(PARI) a(n)=n\3*5+[-1,0,3][n%3+1] \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 22 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
